statements.getAllArticles: SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY dt_created DESC LIMIT :from, :limit
statements.getPublishArticles: SELECT * FROM articles WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY dt_created DESC LIMIT :from, :limit
statements.getArticleById: SELECT * FROM articles WHERE id = ? LIMIT 1
statements.getArticleByShortURL: SELECT * FROM articles WHERE short_url = ? LIMIT 1
statements.getUnApprovedArticle: SELECT * FROM articles WHERE status = -1 ORDER BY dt_created DESC LIMIT :from, :limit
